title: Diamond Bloom Gold Vanki Bracelet
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmarked) with brilliant-cut Diamonds (SI clarity
G-H color). Features a durable build with Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite vanki bracelet features a floral motif with clusters of sparkling diamonds set within each 'flower'. The design seamlessly blends a traditional vanki silhouette with a modern, delicate aesthetic. The high-polish finish enhances the gold's natural luster and showcases the brilliance of the diamonds. Smooth inner band for comfortable all-day wear.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Ugadi
and special occasions. Also suitable as an everyday piece for the modern woman who appreciates a touch of elegance. Ideal for Seemantham and other auspicious occasions.
description: This Vanki bracelet is a stunning blend of traditional design and modern brilliance. Crafted with high-quality gold and diamonds, it is a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. Its versatility allows it to be worn with both traditional and contemporary outfits. It is a statement piece that exudes sophistication and adds a touch of sparkle to any ensemble.
